acceptance_tests: POST /todos creates a new todo and returns 201
GET /todos returns list of todos with pagination
API returns appropriate error codes for invalid requests
goal: Build a REST API for a todo application with full CRUD operations and pagination support
recommendations: Consider using standard pagination parameters (page, limit, offset)
Design todo data model with extensibility for future tagging
Implement proper validation for todo fields

must: Follow REST API conventions and HTTP methods
should: Include proper error handling and responses
